McIvor mouth gag.context: The McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and the tongue depressor applied.

tongue depressor.context: The McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and the tongue depressor applied.

red rubber Robinson catheters.context: Two #12-French red rubber Robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage, and brought out through the oral cavity and clamped over a dental gauze roll placed on the upper lip to provide soft palate retraction.

nasopharynx.context: The nasopharynx was inspected with the laryngeal mirror.

curettes.context: Serial passages of the curettes were utilized to remove the nasopharyngeal tissue,

nasopharyngeal tissue.context: Serial passages of the curettes were utilized to remove the nasopharyngeal tissue,

Neo-Synephrine.context: The nasopharynx was packed with 2 cherry gauze sponges coated in a solution of 0.25% Neo-Synephrine and tannic acid powder.

tannic acid powder.context: The nasopharynx was packed with 2 cherry gauze sponges coated in a solution of 0.25% Neo-Synephrine and tannic acid powder.

Bovie unit.context: The bleeding was controlled with the suction Bovie unit.

suction.context: The nasal passages and oropharynx were suctioned free of debris.

dental gauze roll.context: Two #12-French red rubber Robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage, and brought out through the oral cavity and clamped over a dental gauze roll placed on the upper lip to provide soft palate retraction.

upper lip.context: Two #12-French red rubber Robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage, and brought out through the oral cavity and clamped over a dental gauze roll placed on the upper lip to provide soft palate retraction.

soft palate retraction.context: Two #12-French red rubber Robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage, and brought out through the oral cavity and clamped over a dental gauze roll placed on the upper lip to provide soft palate retraction.

laryngeal mirror.context: The nasopharynx was inspected with the laryngeal mirror.

nasal passages.context: The nasal passages and oropharynx were suctioned free of debris.

oropharynx.context: The nasal passages and oropharynx were suctioned free of debris.

debris.context: The nasal passages and oropharynx were suctioned free of debris.

General endotracheal anesthesia.context: The patient was taken to the operating room and prepped and draped in the usual fashion after induction of general endotracheal anesthesia.

patient tolerated the procedure well.context: The patient tolerated the procedure well and left the operating room in good condition.

left the operating room in good conditio.context: The patient tolerated the procedure well and left the operating room in good condition.
